Package com.google.android.exoplayer2.testutil

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Dumper.Dumpable
    Provides custom dump method.
    ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder.PlayerFactory
    Factory to create an SimpleExoPlayer instance.
    ExtractorAsserts.ExtractorFactory
    A factory for Extractor instances.
    HostActivity.HostedTest
    Interface for tests that run inside of a HostActivity.
    MetricsLogger
    Metric Logging interface for ExoPlayer playback tests.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Base class for actions to perform during playback tests.
    Action.ClearVideoSurface
    Calls SimpleExoPlayer.clearVideoSurface().
    Action.ExecuteRunnable
    Calls Runnable.run().
    Action.PrepareSource
    Calls ExoPlayer.prepare(MediaSource).
    Action.Seek
    Calls Player.seekTo(long).
    Action.SetPlayWhenReady
    Calls Player.setPlayWhenReady(boolean).
    Action.SetRendererDisabled
    Calls MappingTrackSelector.setRendererDisabled(int, boolean).
    Action.SetRepeatMode
    Calls Player.setRepeatMode(int).
    Action.SetShuffleModeEnabled
    Calls Player.setShuffleModeEnabled(boolean).
    Action.SetVideoSurface
    Calls SimpleExoPlayer.setVideoSurface(Surface).
    Action.Stop
    Calls Player.stop().
    Action.WaitForPlaybackState
    Waits for a specified playback state, returning either immediately or after a call to Player.EventListener#onPlayerStateChanged(boolean, int).
    Action.WaitForPositionDiscontinuity
    Waits for Player.EventListener#onPositionDiscontinuity(int).
    Action.WaitForSeekProcessed
    Waits for Player.EventListener#onSeekProcessed().
    Action.WaitForTimelineChanged
    Waits for Player.EventListener#onTimelineChanged(Timeline, Object).
    ActionSchedule
    Schedules a sequence of Actions for execution during a test.
    ActionSchedule.ActionNode
    Wraps an Action, allowing a delay and a next Action to be specified.
    ActionSchedule.Builder
    A builder for ActionSchedule instances.
    ActionSchedule.RootAction
    A no-op root action.
    BuildConfig  
    CacheAsserts
    Assertion methods for Cache.
    DebugRenderersFactory
    A debug extension of DefaultRenderersFactory.
    DebugRenderersFactory.DebugMediaCodecVideoRenderer
    Decodes and renders video using MediaCodecVideoRenderer.
    DecoderCountersUtil
    Assertions for DecoderCounters.
    Dumper
    Helper utility to dump field values.
    ExoHostedTest
    A HostActivity.HostedTest for ExoPlayer playback tests.
    ExoPlayerTestRunner
    Helper class to run an ExoPlayer test.
    ExoPlayerTestRunner.Builder
    Builder to set-up a ExoPlayerTestRunner.
    ExtractorAsserts
    Assertion methods for Extractor.
    FakeAdaptiveDataSet
    Fake data set emulating the data of an adaptive media source.
    FakeAdaptiveDataSet.Factory
    Factory for FakeAdaptiveDataSets.
    FakeAdaptiveMediaPeriod
    Fake MediaPeriod that provides tracks from the given TrackGroupArray.
    FakeAdaptiveMediaSource
    Fake MediaSource that provides a given timeline.
    FakeChunkSource
    Fake ChunkSource with adaptive media chunks of a given duration.
    FakeChunkSource.Factory
    Factory for a FakeChunkSource.
    FakeClock
    Fake Clock implementation independent of SystemClock.
    FakeClock.HandlerPostData  
    FakeDataSet
    Collection of FakeDataSet.FakeData to be served by a FakeDataSource.
    FakeDataSet.FakeData
    Container of fake data to be served by a FakeDataSource.
    FakeDataSet.FakeData.Segment
    A segment of FakeDataSet.FakeData.
    FakeDataSource
    A fake DataSource capable of simulating various scenarios.
    FakeDataSource.Factory
    Factory to create a FakeDataSource.
    FakeExtractorInput
    A fake ExtractorInput capable of simulating various scenarios.
    FakeExtractorInput.Builder
    Builder of FakeExtractorInput instances.
    FakeExtractorOutput
    A fake ExtractorOutput.
    FakeMediaClockRenderer
    Fake abstract Renderer which is also a MediaClock.
    FakeMediaPeriod
    Fake MediaPeriod that provides tracks from the given TrackGroupArray.
    FakeMediaSource
    Fake MediaSource that provides a given timeline.
    FakeRenderer
    Fake Renderer that supports any format with the matching MIME type.
    FakeSampleStream
    Fake SampleStream that outputs a given Format then sets the end of stream flag on its input buffer.
    FakeShuffleOrder
    Fake ShuffleOrder which returns a reverse order.
    FakeSimpleExoPlayer
    Fake SimpleExoPlayer which runs a simplified copy of the playback loop as fast as possible without waiting.
    FakeSimpleExoPlayer.FakeExoPlayer  
    FakeTimeline
    Fake Timeline which can be setup to return custom FakeTimeline.TimelineWindowDefinitions.
    FakeTimeline.TimelineWindowDefinition
    Definition used to define a FakeTimeline.
    FakeTrackOutput
    A fake TrackOutput.
    FakeTrackSelection
    A fake TrackSelection that only returns 1 fixed track, and allows querying the number of calls to its methods.
    FakeTrackSelector
    A fake MappingTrackSelector that returns FakeTrackSelections.
    HostActivity
    A host activity for performing playback tests.
    LogcatMetricsLogger
    Implementation of MetricsLogger that prints the metrics to logcat.
    MediaSourceTestRunner
    A runner for MediaSource tests.
    MediaSourceTestRunner.EventHandlingExoPlayer  
    MetricsLogger.Factory
    A factory for instantiating MetricsLogger instances.
    MockitoUtil
    Utility for setting up Mockito for instrumentation tests.
    OggTestData
    Provides ogg/vorbis test data in bytes for unit tests.
    R  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    StubExoPlayer
    An abstract ExoPlayer implementation that throws UnsupportedOperationException from every method.
    TestUtil
    Utility methods for tests.
    TimelineAsserts
    Unit test for Timeline.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FakeExtractorInput.SimulatedIOException
    Thrown when simulating an IOException.
